Encrypting email

Mailvelope

OpenPGP encryption for webmail

  • Generate or import your public-private key pair.
  • Import and Export public keys.
  • Publish public key.
  • Encrypt messages.
  • Decrypt messages.
  • Chrome and Firefox extension
  • Install from https://www.mailvelope.com/
  • Click the new toolbar icon
    (padlock with a key)
  • Click Options
